price: 78. Dadkii degganaa hawdkana19 waxay iyaguna ahaayeen daalimiin (gar diid).
footnotes: 19. Dadka Aykah ama reer hawdka ama keynta waa qoonkii Shuacyb. Aykah waxay ahayd meel u dhow Madyan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
